intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

I'd like proof of a secure chat
Why would I trust this chat?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

values.text: Have you eaten breakfast yet?
How is your day?
I will be listening for any complications you might have.
Calling ambulance now, they will be with you shortly!
In the meantime, unlock your door for the paramedics to enter.
Do call if there is an emergency, okay?
You may be showing signs of dementia. I would like to refer you to a specialist.

values: Okay, let me repeat what I just said.
No problem, I will repeat the question one more time.
I see you need help making an appointment. Let me transfer you to an agent...

values.text:
Very good.
I will be around when you need me. Just call for me anytime for assistance.
